Why Us?

Since our establishment in 2004, Our mission is to provide creative information technologies and professional services in the Health, Defense, and Civilian sectors. Our employees are 75 percent veterans and we organize training and innovative programs to enhance the skills of veterans that enables them to compete in cutting edge technological environment. We form strategic partnerships and create a path forward to achieve goals and excel to become a partner of choice. Our services ensure that our federal agencies are in safe hands and that high-quality goods and services will be delivered on time and within budget. We also have a track record of achievement with clients in the Department of Army, Department of State, Department of Veterans Affairs, Department of Homeland Security, and other defense and civilian agencies, as shown by successful contract outcomes. We have big organization capability while maintaining the flexibility and competitiveness of a small business, meeting and exceeding changing requirements. We are proud exporters of made in USA products.

Certifications

OUR SERVICES

We offer a customized solution
for your IT business

Managed IT

Tailored and comprehensive IT solutions to optimize your business performance. We are fully accountable for a monthly track record of successfully executing projects across a wide range of locations.

Read more

Cybersecurity

Real-time analytics provide real-time situational awareness on a global scale. We enable an in-depth view of behavioral anomalies on your network.

Read more

Database Management

For your business actions Accentuate is the right partner to handle, proactively track, administer, optimize, and secure your database in our data-driven IT environment.

Read more

Healthcare

We work with government healthcare agencies, facilities, and pharmacies that create new possibilities and positively affect our patient care. We enhance technological capacity and optimize the budget to enhance employee loyalty.

Read more

Staff Augmentation

High-skilled services with low-cost, a good understanding of system design and workflow; we expand the team and augment the work capacity of your organization.

Read more

Business Process Reengineering

Prepare, track, and optimize business. We radically redesign the core business processes to achieve dramatic improvements in productivity for our clients.

Read more

Biotechnology

IWRM’s strategy for Renewable Water was never affordable before. We craft high-impact, rapidly implemented programs and projects to speed up the roll-out of business initiatives.

Read more

Aviation

Our customized solution leverages our manufacturer partnerships. We guide you through every step on integrating clinical products with IT, as well as procurement and finance options that make sense for you.

Read more

Made in USA Products

Accentuate proudly exports Made in USA products like Tactical gears, Technology, equipment and accessories, Medical Equipment, Vehicle accessories, and Tires/Batteries around the globe.

Read more
